translation.en: [kid] Whoaaa! Whoo-hoo!
♪ Ride on the Magic School Bus ♪
-Whoaaa! -Oh, the humanity!
Hold on, everybody.
We're experiencing my favorite thing about air travel: turbulence.
translation.zh:
‎我们遇到了飞行中
‎我最喜欢的一种情况： ‎扰动气流！

translation.en: And here comes my second-favorite thing. Wind shear!
translation.zh:
‎-噢 不好
‎-这是我第二喜欢的情况： ‎风切变

translation.en: I hope we don't find out what your third-favorite thing is, Ms. Frizzle.
translation.zh:
‎我不想知道你第三喜欢的情况是什么
‎福瑞斯老师！

translation.en: Can't you get us out of this?
Well, here's the challenge, Arnold.
Because this is a hot-air balloon, I can't steer it.
translation.zh: ‎因为这是一只热气球 ‎所以我无法使它转向

translation.en: I can only make it do three things: go up...
Go down...
What's the third thing?
Go down fast!
I knew I should've stayed home today!
translation.zh: ‎我就知道今天应该呆在家的！

translation.en: Don't say that, Arnold. This is all because of you, remember?
translation.zh: ‎别这么说 阿诺德 ‎这都是因为你 记得吗？

translation.en: Happy birthday, Arnold!
I made this card for you.
[Arnold] Hmm. You really captured my essence.
And don't forget about your biggest present.
You, Arnold, get to choose... our field trip.
translation.zh:
‎阿诺德 你可以选择
‎我们去哪里野外实习

translation.en: I guess we're staying home today.
translation.zh: ‎看来我们今天要呆在家里了

translation.en: Even better.
We're headed to the International Balloon Fiesta in Albuquerque, New Mexico.
translation.zh:
‎我们要去新墨西哥阿尔伯克基的
‎国际热气球嘉年华！

translation.en: Come on! Whoo-hoo!
-[kids cheering] -[Bus honks]
OK, here we go.
Huh?
isn't the balloon supposed to be... balloon-y?
Where's the helium?
[Ms. Frizzle] No helium in hot-air balloons, Ralphie.
translation.zh: ‎拉尔夫 热气球不用充氦气！

translation.en: The clue is in the words "hot" and "air."
No problem. Ralphie's full of that.
translation.zh: ‎没问题 拉尔夫肚子里有的是热气

translation.en: OK. First, we put in the air.
Why isn't it rising?
It won't rise until we put in the hot.
I remember this.
When you heat something, the molecules move faster!
translation.zh: ‎当你给物质加热时 分子运动加速！

translation.en: Fast-moving air molecules will spread apart and fill the balloon!
translation.zh:
‎快速运动的空气分子会扩散开
‎充满气球！

translation.en: And when air molecules spread apart, the air is less dense.
translation.zh: ‎当空气分子扩散 空气密度就会降低

translation.en: Hot, less-dense air
rises above the cooler, denser air outside the balloon.
translation.zh:
‎上升 气球外面的空气较冷 密度较大
‎就会相对下沉

translation.en: [Jyoti] The hot air rises, taking the balloon along with it!
translation.zh: ‎热空气上升 就带着气球飞起来了！

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] OK, class!
-All aboard! -Come on!
-This is amazing! -Full speed ahead!
translation.zh:
‎-快！
‎-野外实习！ ‎太棒了！ ‎全速前进！

translation.en: Full speed? Oh, no, no, no, no, no.
Balloons don't have engines or rockets to push them forward.
translation.zh:
‎气球没有引擎或火箭喷射器
‎推着它们往前飞

translation.en: They just go up and down. That's why I love them.
translation.zh: ‎它们只能上下飞 ‎所以我喜欢

translation.en: Then... how do we go anywhere?
We just drift along on the currents of air,
like floating down a lazy river
translation.zh:
‎就像坐着一艘经过全面检修
‎绝对不漏的筏子

translation.en: on a fully inspected, totally leakproof raft.
translation.zh:
‎就像坐着一艘经过全面检修
‎绝对不漏的筏子 ‎在缓缓流淌的河上漫游

translation.en: Kick back and relax for... the best field trip ever!
translation.zh: ‎舒服地坐着 别紧张 ‎享受有史以来最棒的野外实习吧

translation.en: You said hot-air balloons were quiet and gentle drifting on currents of air.
translation.zh:
‎你说热气球很安静很轻柔
‎只是随风飘游

translation.en: How could I know we'd hit a thunderstorm?
translation.zh: ‎我怎么知道我们会遇到雷电风暴？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know... by checking your forecast?
Don't worry! We'll be fine as long as we don't get hit by...
translation.zh: ‎别担心！ ‎我们不会有事的 只要别遇到…

translation.en: [kids] Lightning!
Whoo-hoo!
Dude, what just happened?
Where did the sun go?
Is it just the three of us? Where's everybody else?
And what's up with the Bus?
Bigger question: where are we?
-Uh, guys? -[Ms. Frizzle singing] Something funny is happening...
translation.zh: ‎你们两个 出了奇怪的事

translation.en: ♪ We're on a clear blue sea in Waikiki ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们身在威基基湛蓝的海面上

translation.en: ♪ But something funny's going on with me ♪ Kapow!
translation.zh: ‎但奇怪的事情发生了 转瞬之间！

translation.en: ♪ You're hangin' with the Frizz ♪
translation.zh: ‎你们和福瑞兹在一起 荡悠悠！

translation.en: Get it? Hangin'?
Because we're suspended from a hot-air balloon, of course.
translation.zh: ‎当然 因为我们坐在热气球上

translation.en: Also... [snorts] We're in Hawaii! [laughs]
♪ We're on a clear blue sea in Waikiki... ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们身在威基基湛蓝的海面上…

translation.en: What are you guys doing?
Dancing! It's super catchy!
translation.zh: ‎跳舞啊 这旋律又好听又好记！

translation.en: ♪ You're hangin' with the Frizz ♪
translation.zh: ‎你们和福瑞兹在一起 荡悠悠！

translation.en: Intense. That was crazy loud.
translation.zh: ‎好紧张 刚才的声音好大

translation.en: You mean the storm or Arnold's screams?
translation.zh: ‎你是说风暴还是说阿诺德的尖叫声？

translation.en: Hey... Where is Arnold?
And everyone else?
I know this coastline.
Last time I was here, I faced one of my most death-defying adventures,
translation.zh:
‎上次在这里 我遭遇了我这辈子
‎最九死一生的冒险：

translation.en: the Buried Mummy of Chan-Chan.
Upside is, I know how long it takes to dig out of a tomb
translation.zh:
‎好消息是 我知道仅用皮带扣
‎和一枚纽扣

translation.en: with nothing but a belt buckle and a button.
translation.zh: ‎需要多久可以从古墓里挖到地面

translation.en: Welcome to Peru, kids!
-Peru? -Button?
But what about the Balloon Fiesta?
Balloon Fiesta? [groans]
Where's the adventure in that?
Let's take this baby to the Andes Mountains
translation.zh: ‎我们把热气球开到安第斯山脉

translation.en: and surf some serious air currents!
That's an adventure!
-Hold on to your shirts... -[flames roar]
[Ms. Frizzle] Yeah!
DA! Liz! Are you all right?
Wait... Am I all right?
I've lost the ability to see the rest of the class!
translation.zh: ‎我已经看不见其他的同学了！

translation.en: -Oh, no! I'm class blind! -No, you're not.
translation.zh: ‎我班盲了！看不见班上的同学们了！ ‎不 你没有

translation.en: -They're not here. It's just us. -[Arnold shudders]
This is like my recurring dream of a field trip descending into total chaos.
translation.zh:
‎真像我反复做的一个噩梦 在梦里
‎野外实习变成了灾难

translation.en: Only, oh, wait! That dream is real. And it's every single trip!
translation.zh: ‎只是…噢 等等！那梦是真的 ‎而且每次野外实习都这样！

translation.en: I admit this is stranger than usual, Arnold, but we'll figure it out.
translation.zh:
‎我承认这次格外离奇 阿诺德
‎但我们会有办法的

translation.en: How? Ms. Frizzle is gone.
translation.zh: ‎什么办法？福瑞斯老师不见了

translation.en: I'll never get to tell her how much I actually learned from her.
translation.zh:
‎她教会了我很多东西
‎可我没机会告诉她了

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] There's much more to learn, Arnold,
translation.zh: ‎阿诺德 还有很多需要学的呢

translation.en: like how not to talk about people when they aren't there.
translation.zh: ‎比如 不要在背后议论别人

translation.en: [stammers] Ms. Frizzle?
Yes, and that is clearly the iconic lighthouse of Peggy's Cove, Nova Scotia.
translation.zh:
‎是的 那显然是新斯科舍佩姬湾的
‎著名灯塔

translation.en: Nova Scotia, Canada? What happened during the storm
translation.zh:
‎加拿大新斯科舍？ ‎刚才的风暴中发生了什么事？
‎我们怎么从阿尔伯克基

translation.en: that we ended up on the opposite side of the continent from Albuquerque?
translation.zh:
‎刚才的风暴中发生了什么事？
‎我们怎么从阿尔伯克基 ‎跑到大陆另一端了？

translation.en: When lightning struck the Bus, the power surge caused a rupture.
translation.zh:
‎闪电击中校车时
‎引起的电涌造成了撕裂

translation.en: The Bus has clearly been split and separated.
translation.zh: ‎很显然 校车被分成了几段

translation.en: Where's everyone else?
An excellent question, Dorothy Ann.
translation.zh: ‎这个问题好极了 陶乐西安

translation.en: Class, what would be the best way to find them?
translation.zh:
‎同学们 要找到他们
‎最好的办法是什么？

translation.en: Well, if the other FrizzPad is with the other part of the Bus...
translation.zh:
‎如果另一半校车上
‎也有一个福瑞斯平板…

translation.en: We should be able to track them!
Good thinking, you two.
I would also have accepted "Scream their names as loudly as we can." -[FrizzPad beeps] -Hmm.
translation.zh: ‎我也接受“大声喊他们的名字”

translation.en: -This FrizzPad's on the fritz! -[beeping]
There we go.
I think we found them, but...
translation.zh: ‎我们好像找到他们了 但是

translation.en: could this be right?
The other half of the Bus is in...
Peru?
Guys! Someone's calling us!
Please let it be a rescue team!
Wanda! You're OK!
-Arnold! Am I glad to see you! -Hey, Arn!
translation.zh:
‎-阿诺德！见到你真高兴！
‎-嘿 阿诺德！

translation.en: -We were starting to get worried. -Where's the rest of the class?
translation.zh: ‎我们都开始担心了呢 ‎其他同学呢？

translation.en: We're in Nova Scotia, Canada, but it's just DA and me.
translation.zh:
‎我们在加拿大新斯科舍
‎但这里只有我和陶乐西

translation.en: Hold on! A part of the Bus is also in... -Hawaii! -[device beeps]
translation.zh: ‎等等 还有一部分校车在…夏威夷！

translation.en: Keesha!
Am I glad to see you guys! I need help immediately!
translation.zh: ‎见到你们真高兴！ ‎我急需帮助！

translation.en: I've got a situation over here.
Carlos, Ralphie and Ms. Frizzle won't stop acting silly,
translation.zh:
‎卡洛斯、拉尔夫和福瑞斯老师
‎疯疯癫癫的

translation.en: even more than usual.
But... that's not possible!
Oh, I assure you, it is very possible!
translation.zh:
‎-我向你们保证 绝对可能
‎-哈！嗬嗬！

translation.en: No. How can Ms. Frizzle be with you when she's here with us in Peru right now?
translation.zh:
‎不 ‎福瑞斯老师现在和我们一起在秘鲁
‎她怎么会在你们那里？

translation.en: -See? -Whoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo!
You know how they say you can never have too much of a good thing?
translation.zh: ‎你知道 人们说好东西永远不嫌多

translation.en: Well, we all have a Frizzle!
Surprise.
[laughs] You get a Frizzle! She gets a Frizzle! We all get Frizzles!
translation.zh:
‎你有一个福瑞斯！她有一个福瑞斯！
‎我们每人都有个福瑞斯！

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle split into three?
Ah! This is all starting to make sense now.
translation.zh: ‎福瑞斯老师一分为三了？ ‎我开始明白了

translation.en: Really? Uh, according to my research...
Oh, who am I kidding? There's no research to support this!
translation.zh:
‎开什么玩笑啊 没有什么调查
‎能解释眼下的情形！

translation.en: This is impossible!
Improbable, but not impossible, Dorothy Ann.
translation.zh: ‎可能性较低 不是绝不可能发生

translation.en: This isn't my first split.
Last time I experienced a magic rupture, I fractured into three parts as well.
translation.zh: ‎上次我经历神奇撕裂 也一分为三了

translation.en: What you're seeing is only one-third of me.
translation.zh: ‎你们看到的 只是三分之一个我

translation.en: There's also the wacky, goofy, silly side of me.
I call her "The Frizz."
[laughs] Wacky, goofy side? Never met her!
She sounds pretty awesome, though, eh? Eh?
translation.zh: ‎不过她听起来很酷啊 是不是？

translation.en: And I'm the daring, adventurous side. Fiona!
translation.zh: ‎我是勇敢 爱冒险的那一面： ‎菲奥娜！

translation.en: Whoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo!
Inconceivable! Our Frizz just jumped out of the balloon!
translation.zh: ‎难以想象！ ‎我们的福瑞斯老师跳下去了！

translation.en: -What? -[laughs] Classic me!
And then there's this part of me.
The reliable teacher who only wants to observe and learn from a safe distance.
translation.zh:
‎一个可靠的教师 只想保持安全距离
‎观察和学习

translation.en: Music to my ears.
Good. Then please sit.
Sitting is 77.84% safer than standing.
And swinging is 100% more fun than sitting! Whooo-hoo!
translation.zh: ‎荡秋千比坐着好玩程度高一倍！啊！

translation.en: Uh, shouldn't we be finding a way to get all three Frizzles back together?
translation.zh:
‎我们不应该想办法
‎让三个福瑞斯重新合体吗？

translation.en: You mean, "Shouldn't we be finding a way to get all three Frizzles back together
translation.zh:
‎你是想说：“我们不应该想办法
‎及时让三个福瑞斯

translation.en: in time?"
In time? What do you mean, in time?
[Ms. Frizzle] Observe.
What... what's happening?
Hey! Would someone give her a hand?
[laughs] Hey, nice one! -Whoa! -[thuds]
No one stands alone, class.
translation.zh: ‎同学们 我们都需要相互依靠

translation.en: Especially when they've been split into three parts.
translation.zh: ‎特别是当我们一分为三的时候

translation.en: Meaning?
Yeah, unforch, the, uh, Frizzle fragments can't survive on their own.
translation.zh:
‎是的 很遗憾 福瑞斯的分身
‎不能单独存活

translation.en: I'm fading away, and so are the others.
translation.zh: ‎我会渐渐消失 其他两个也会

translation.en: That's right. If we're not reunited soon, all three of us will disappear.
translation.zh:
‎对 如果我们不能及时合体
‎我们都会消失

translation.en: You mean, you'll f-f-fade away f-f-forever?
Correct. You're developing excellent comprehension skills, Arnold.
translation.zh: ‎是的 阿诺德 你的理解能力好极了

translation.en: We just need to work on your delivery. You'll fade away forever?
translation.zh:
‎-我们只需要锻炼你的表达能力
‎-你会永远消失？

translation.en: Oh, much better.
We can't let that happen! We gotta reunite all three Frizzles!
translation.zh:
‎我们不能让你消失！ ‎我们要帮助三个福瑞斯复合！
‎而且要复合快！

translation.en: We have to do it quick!
translation.zh:
‎我们要帮助三个福瑞斯复合！
‎而且要复合快！

translation.en: Quickly. Adverb!
-Quickly! -Hmm.
It would make sense to get back to Albuquerque where the separation started.
translation.zh:
‎大家都回阿尔伯克基
‎是比较合理的选择 ‎我们是在那里分开的

translation.en: Albuquerque-ly!
What an excellent deduction, Dorothy Ann.
translation.zh: ‎陶乐西安 你的推理很好

translation.en: I'll try to coordinate with the other groups!
First-rate plan, but please stay away from the sides
translation.zh:
‎绝妙计划 但你来回走的时候
‎别太靠边了

translation.en: while pacing around the basket. Safety first.
translation.zh:
‎绝妙计划 但你来回走的时候
‎别太靠边了 ‎安全第一

translation.en: What is she even doing?
-Unsure. -But it looks like fun!
translation.zh: ‎不清楚 但貌似很好玩啊！

translation.en: Yaaaay!
Whoo-hooo!
Watch out!
-Whoo-hooo! -[thud]
-[kids gasp] -Oh, no!
-Now what? -We gotta pull her up!
translation.zh: ‎现在怎么办？ ‎我们得把她拉上来

translation.en: Ptooey! I got a better idea!
-Whoo-whooo! -[kids] No!
[Tim] How is that a better idea?
I'll show you. I'm in a river, and so are you!
translation.zh: ‎我来告诉你们 ‎我在一条河里 你们也是

translation.en: Water currents are like air currents, kids!
Picture the air moving you along like this river is pushing me!
translation.zh:
‎想象一下 空气推着你们向前走
‎就像河水推着我向前走

translation.en: Remarkable. She jumped into a river to teach us a lesson!
translation.zh: ‎不简单啊 ‎她为了教我们知识 纵身跳进河里！

translation.en: ♪ Here we go! ♪ Whoo-hoo!
Water currents push me.
Air currents push the balloon and you! Whoo-hoo!
-[Jyoti] Oh, no! -Ms. Frizzle, stop looking at us!
translation.zh: ‎噢 不好！ ‎福瑞斯老师 别看我们了！

translation.en: -Look in front of you! -[all] There's a waterfall!
Whoo! Yee-ha!
[Tim] We have to get Ms. Frizzle out of there!
The Bus usually has the best gadgets. Let's see what we've got here.
translation.zh:
‎校车上一般有最棒的工具
‎我们看看有什么

translation.en: -Uh... this one! -[button beeps]
How did I miss? I was aiming right for her!
translation.zh:
‎怎么会打歪了呢？
‎我是瞄准她发射的！

translation.en: We have to take the air current into account.
So try aiming a little behind her!
translation.zh: ‎所以 瞄准她身后一点试试

translation.en: Look in front of you!
It's coming up fast!
[Ms. Frizzle] That's why they call 'em rapids!
Whoo-hoo!
Yee-ha!
We've got her!
Tasty save!
So, kids, while I was heading toward a waterfall, what did you learn?
translation.zh:
‎那么孩子们 我漂向瀑布的时候
‎你们学到了什么？

translation.en: The Bus has a magic gross lizard tongue?
translation.zh: ‎校车有个神奇又恶心的蜥蜴舌头？

translation.en: You learned that the balloon is riding air currents, the rivers of the sky!
translation.zh: ‎你们学到了 气球是乘着气流飞行 ‎气流就是空中的河流

translation.en: -[kids gasp] -Oh, no!
translation.zh: ‎气流就是空中的河流 ‎噢 不！

translation.en: Whoa! Stealth mode! [laughs] Cool!
We have to get to Albuquerque ASAP.
translation.zh: ‎我们得尽快赶到阿尔伯克基

translation.en: Then we need to head north as fast as we can!
translation.zh: ‎那么 我们需要尽快向北方前进！

translation.en: Arnold said the balloon only moves forward on air currents.
translation.zh: ‎阿诺德说 气球是乘着气流前进

translation.en: But you can't steer to find one, you can only go up and down.
translation.zh: ‎但你没法驾驶气球找到气流 ‎你只能上下移动

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle, how do we find a current to ride?
translation.zh:
‎福瑞斯老师
‎我们怎么找到合适的气流？

translation.en: I'm sorry, Keesha! I can't talk right now. -I'm on a very important call. -[thunder rumbles]
translation.zh:
‎对不起 凯莎！我现在不能说话
‎我在打一个重要的电话

translation.en: -Yes, I'll hold. -Seriously?
As serious as that storm behind you.
translation.zh: ‎就像你身后的风暴一样真实

translation.en: [splutters] I'm so sorry about that. It's bananas around here.
No way I want to go through another storm.
Yeah. We might get hit with lightning again,
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我们可能又会被闪电击中

translation.en: and I might split into my three main parts:
Ralphie, Awesome Ralphie and Super Awesome Ralphie.
translation.zh:
‎拉尔夫、出色的拉尔夫
‎和超级出色的拉尔夫

translation.en: The world couldn't take it.
translation.zh:
‎-世界承受不了
‎-喂？你越来越微弱！

translation.en: Hello? You're fading out! Oh, wait, that's me.
translation.zh:
‎-世界承受不了
‎-喂？你越来越微弱！ ‎哦 等等 是我

translation.en: She's fading? We have to find a way out of this!
translation.zh:
‎她在渐渐消失？
‎我们得想办法摆脱麻烦！

translation.en: The only thing I know how to do on this balloon is to go up and down.
translation.zh:
‎在这个气球上
‎我只知道怎么上升和下降

translation.en: Which is it?
Maybe we can see a way out from higher up.
translation.zh: ‎也许我们升到更高空会找到出路

translation.en: Good thinking, Carlos!
Turning up the heat makes the air inside the balloon spread out.
translation.zh: ‎加热会让气球里的空气膨胀

translation.en: Spreading out makes the air less dense.
And less-dense air in the balloon means... we go up!
translation.zh:
‎气球里空气密度降低意味着…
‎我们会上升

translation.en: Whoa! We're picking up speed!
We must have drifted into a major air current.
translation.zh: ‎我们一定是漂进了一大股强气流

translation.en: Yeah! A major air current that's heading towards California.
translation.zh:
‎对！一股强气流
‎向加利福尼亚方向流动

translation.en: We're going to take Hollywood by storm.
translation.zh: ‎我们要携风雷之势飞向好莱坞了

translation.en: -[thunder crashes] -Specifically that storm!
We've caught a southwesterly air current. We're headed in the right direction.
translation.zh:
‎我们赶上了一股西南气流 ‎-我们的方向正确
‎-真的？

translation.en: Really? Wow! That's great!
translation.zh:
‎-我们的方向正确
‎-真的？ ‎啊 太好了

translation.en: I can finally kick back and relax for my birthday.
translation.zh: ‎终于可以躺下 轻轻松松过生日了

translation.en: Relax? There's no relaxing here.
translation.zh: ‎轻轻松松？这里可没有轻轻松松

translation.en: There's too much to learn!
Now give me back the FrizzPad, pretty please.
translation.zh: ‎现在 请把福瑞斯平板还给我

translation.en: Dorothy Ann, here's your homework to complete on weather patterns.
translation.zh:
‎陶乐西安 这是你们
‎关于气象规律的家庭作业

translation.en: How can we do homework when we're not even home?
translation.zh: ‎我们都不在家 哪来的家庭作业？

translation.en: Good point, Arnold. Let's just call it "balloon work."
translation.zh:
‎有道理 阿诺德
‎我们就叫它“气球作业”吧

translation.en: -Don't you just love a... -[kids scream]
We need to find an air current that's going northwest towards Albuquerque!
translation.zh:
‎我们需要找到一股
‎流向阿尔伯克基的西北气流！

translation.en: How do we do that?
[Ms. Frizzle] Feeling a little pressure, Tim?
So is the balloon. Air pressure, that is! Uh-oh!
Ms. Frizzle!
And today's in-flight movie is a showing of the award-winning... -Whoa! -[kids gasp]
translation.zh: ‎今天的机上电影将放映获奖的… 啊！

translation.en: Hey! Who's pulling my leg... off?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 谁在开玩笑…拉我的腿？

translation.en: -Whoa... -This is seriously strange! What happened to your leg?
And what movie were you going to show?
What? Too soon?
A headless teacher?
Why can't anything be normal?
Ms. Frizzle! Look out!
Oh, wait. She probably can't hear me.
translation.zh: ‎哦 等等 她可能听不见

translation.en: Why aren't you doing your balloon work? Don't you want to get ahead?
translation.zh:
‎你们怎么还不做气球作业？
‎你们不想出人头地吗？

translation.en: We got a head when yours came back! It was so weird!
translation.zh: ‎你的头回来了 我们就有头了！ ‎太诡异了！

translation.en: Your head was gone for such a long time.
Then my time is indeed running short.
translation.zh: ‎这么说 我的时间真的不多了

translation.en: All the more reason to get your studies done.
translation.zh: ‎你们更应该赶快完成作业了

translation.en: I can't grade your work if I'm not around to see it.
translation.zh: ‎我不在了 就没法给你们批改作业

translation.en: But, Ms. Frizzle, I really think we need to focus on Albuquerque!
translation.zh:
‎但是 福瑞斯老师 我真的认为
‎我们应该集中精力赶到阿尔伯克基！

translation.en: Trust me, Arnold. Doing your balloon work is the safest course of action.
translation.zh:
‎相信我 阿诺德 完成你们的气球作业
‎是最安全的选择

translation.en: And isn't that what you want, to be safe and calm?
translation.zh: ‎这不正是你想要的吗？安全又清静？

translation.en: -But how is homework... -Uh-uh-uh!
...uh, I mean balloon work, going to help us?
translation.zh:
‎我是说气球作业
‎对我们有什么帮助啊？

translation.en: You'll find the books on this balloon are extremely relevant.
translation.zh:
‎你会发现这个气球上的书籍
‎和现状有很大关系

translation.en: Read aloud, please.
-[screams] -Whoa! Holographic books!
[chuckles] Right... holographic books.
"Just like the burners on our balloon, the Sun warms the Earth's air.
translation.zh: ‎“就像热气球上的燃烧器一样 ‎太阳也在加热地球的空气

translation.en: But it warms up some parts of the Earth more, like near the Equator,
translation.zh:
‎但地球的有些地方受热更多
‎比如赤道

translation.en: and less in other parts, like the North and South Poles."
translation.zh: ‎有些地方受热较少 比如南北极”

translation.en: [DA] "That causes a difference in air pressure
that would start air moving from the Equator to the poles and back again."
translation.zh: ‎导致空气从赤道流向两极 再流回来”

translation.en: Well read, you two. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎读得好 你们俩 谢谢

translation.en: Hey, welcome back, Lefty!
translation.zh: ‎嘿 左胳膊 欢迎回来！

translation.en: How can she be so calm?
Especially when we're under so much pressure!
translation.zh: ‎特别是在我们压力这么大的时候！

translation.en: Ah, pressure! Yeah, that reminds me.
translation.zh: ‎啊 压力！对 我倒想起来了

translation.en: Tim, you make a great balloon.
Uh... why is this happening? And why do I feel so full?
translation.zh:
‎为什么会这样？
‎我怎么感觉这么胀气？

translation.en: Because of the pressure from all that air squeezed together inside you.
translation.zh: ‎因为空气被压进了你的体内

translation.en: What happens when you really let the pressure out?
translation.zh: ‎当你真正释放压力 会怎么样呢？

translation.en: -[air splutters] -[girls] Tim!
What? I'm a balloon!
The air rushes outside to where the air pressure is lower!
Maybe that's what makes air currents,
air rushing from places with high pressure to low pressure!
translation.zh:
‎空气从高气压的地方
‎流向低气压的地方！

translation.en: So if we find an air current moving in the right direction...
translation.zh:
‎所以 如果我们能
‎找到方向正确的气流…

translation.en: ...and we raise and lower the balloon at the right time to put ourselves in its path...
translation.zh:
‎并且在适当的时机升降气球
‎进入它流经的路径…

translation.en: ...we'll catch the current!
Fire it up!
[Jyoti] It's working! We're moving!
Looks like we're headed northwest to Albuquerque.
translation.zh:
‎看来我们在向西北方向前进
‎向阿尔伯克基前进

translation.en: Fortuitous!
-I'm starting to think we got this! -[air splutters]
-[Tim] Whoa! -Oh, no! Tim!
[screams] I wanna be a balloon again!
[Ms. Frizzle] Gotcha!
-[thuds] -Let's never do that again!
And you won't have to 'cause you've had your turn as a balloon.
translation.zh: ‎也没必要了 ‎因为你已经变过气球了

translation.en: Ladies, who's next?
Oh, oh!
[Carlos] That storm is moving fast.
But then, so are we.
I know, and at least we're going more or less in the right direction.
translation.zh:
‎我知道 而且至少我们的方向是对的
‎是吧？

translation.en: Found it!
Awww! I was hoping the lightning had split my lunch into three, too.
translation.zh:
‎我就希望闪电能把我的午餐
‎也变成三份

translation.en: [chuckles] Hungry, are ya?
Aren't we too high up in the air to go fishing?
translation.zh: ‎我们这么高 怎么钓鱼啊？

translation.en: And how can you catch anything at this speed?
translation.zh: ‎而且这么快 怎么能钓到任何东西？

translation.en: We're going, like, 112 kilometers per hour!
That's 70 miles an hour, but it sounds more impressive in metric.
translation.zh:
‎也就是每小时70英里
‎但用公制听起来更厉害

translation.en: Whoa! I got somethin'!
translation.zh: ‎啊！有东西上钩了 感觉可能是…

translation.en: Actually, it feels like it might be... Whoa! This might be something!
translation.zh: ‎啊！有东西上钩了 感觉可能是… ‎啊！可能是条大鱼！

translation.en: Almost... got it.
-[object whooshes] -Whoa! What is it?
[Ralphie] It's your phone!
[Ms. Frizzle] Don't be silly, Ralphie. [snorts] It's a pineapple!
translation.zh: ‎别傻了 拉尔夫 ‎这是个菠萝 这只能说明一件事！

translation.en: That can only mean one thing!
translation.zh: ‎这是个菠萝 这只能说明一件事！

translation.en: That you found the weirdest fishing hole of all time?
translation.zh: ‎你找到了史上最稀奇的鱼坑？

translation.en: We must be in... the Pineapple Express!
translation.zh: ‎我们一定进入了… 菠萝快车！

translation.en: What's the Pineapple Express?
It's a Hawaiian special delivery service. Let me show you what I'm talking about.
translation.zh:
‎它是一种夏威夷特别快递服务
‎我来演示一下

translation.en: -Going up! -[flames roar]
[Keesha] Wow! We're so high up!
And you'd think we'd have better reception.
translation.zh:
‎你还以为这里信号会更好些呢
‎客房服务？

translation.en: Hello, room service? Would you send up a room?
translation.zh:
‎你还以为这里信号会更好些呢
‎客房服务？ ‎给我们一间客房好吗？

translation.en: Ohh! What? Can't you see that's funny? Here, try these.
translation.zh:
‎怎么了？你们不觉得好玩吗？
‎来 戴上试试

translation.en: I can't tell if this is serious or just seriously weird.
translation.zh: ‎不知道这是真心的 还是真心搞怪的

translation.en: Whoa! Check it out, Keesha!
These glasses let you actually see the air currents moving through the sky!
translation.zh:
‎这副眼镜
‎能让你看到气流在空中流动！

translation.en: [Carlos] That air current is massive, like a river of air!
translation.zh: ‎这股气流好大啊 像空中的大河

translation.en: Exactly. People call that river of air the Pineapple Express.
translation.zh:
‎没错 人们管这条空中大河
‎叫菠萝快车

translation.en: [Ralphie] That thing is way bigger than a normal river!
[Ms. Frizzle] Atmospheric rivers can be over 100 miles wide and over 1,000 miles long!
translation.zh:
‎大气河流可以达到161公里宽
‎1609公里长！

translation.en: Or over 160 kilometers wide and over 1,609 kilometers long.
You're right, it does sound more impressive in metric.
translation.zh: ‎你说的对 用公制的确显着更厉害

translation.en: This one goes all the way from Hawaii to California. Wow!
translation.zh:
‎这股气流从夏威夷
‎一直延伸到加利福尼亚

translation.en: And it carries storms and rain...
And all sorts of other weather.
Weather from Hawaii can go to California? That's crazy!
translation.zh:
‎夏威夷的天气
‎可以影响到加利福尼亚？ ‎太疯狂了

translation.en: So... the whole planet is connected.
translation.zh: ‎所以 整个星球都是互通互联的

translation.en: Air currents carry weather from one part of the Earth to another!
translation.zh:
‎大气环流把气象活动从一个地方
‎带到另一个地方

translation.en: Bingo! Oh, wait, back up. Not bingo yet.
translation.zh: ‎说对了！哦 慢着 还不能庆祝

translation.en: I still need one more group scream from you all to get the full row.
translation.zh:
‎我还需要一次集体尖叫
‎才能凑齐一整竖列

translation.en: So, the storm's been following us because it's in the same atmospheric river as we are!
translation.zh:
‎所以 那个风暴一直跟着我们
‎因为我们处在同一条大气河流里！

translation.en: Yup. That big air current is carrying a ton of moisture from the tropics
translation.zh:
‎是的 这股空气环流
‎把热带地区的水气

translation.en: to the West Coast.
Once this "river" hits land, the water vapor will cool...
translation.zh:
‎这条“河流”触及陆地时
‎水蒸气就会冷却…

translation.en: And make rain!
So it sounds like we can ride this sky river back to the West Coast!
translation.zh:
‎我们好像可以
‎顺着这条天空河流回到西海岸！

translation.en: Yep! As soon as we get into the current.
translation.zh: ‎对！只要我们飞进这股气流就行

translation.en: -Going down! -[kids] Whoaaaa!
[Ms. Frizzle] Bingo!
[groans] The FrizzPad is still acting up!
I can't call the other two groups to check in.
translation.zh: ‎我和其他两个小分队联系不上了

translation.en: But I can see them on the map.
And the other two balloons are making their way to Albuquerque! Yes!
translation.zh:
‎另外两只气球在向阿尔伯克基进发
‎好啊！

translation.en: Excellent! We have a real shot at saving Ms. Frizzle, Arnold!
translation.zh:
‎好极了阿诺德
‎我们真的有希望拯救福瑞斯老师呢！

translation.en: Then this birthday trip might be OK after all!
translation.zh: ‎那样的话 这个生日旅行还算不错

translation.en: -Whoo-hoo! -Tsk-tsk.
translation.zh:
‎-喔嗬！
‎-注意 安全第一 阿诺德

translation.en: Safety first, Arnold. No jumping on the balloon.
translation.zh:
‎-喔嗬！
‎-注意 安全第一 阿诺德 ‎在气球上不要蹦跳

translation.en: Now here, put these on and get back to your studies.
translation.zh: ‎来 把这个穿上 继续做作业吧

translation.en: Life vests?
Those are for water and we're flying completely over dry land.
translation.zh:
‎这是水上穿的
‎而我们是在陆地上空飞行

translation.en: Salutem primum, that's my motto.
translation.zh: ‎安全第一 这是我的座右铭

translation.en: It means "Safety first."
Liz, I have a vest for you too!
translation.zh: ‎蜥蜥 我也给你准备了救生衣！

translation.en: Onward and westward to Albuquerque!
translation.zh: ‎前进 一路向西 回阿尔伯克基

translation.en: [Ralphie] Wow! All that rain made it from Hawaii to California.
translation.zh:
‎啊！所有那些雨从夏威夷来到了
‎加利福尼亚

translation.en: [Carlos] Just like us.
We rode the same air current as the storm. It's all connected.
translation.zh:
‎我们和风暴乘着同一股气流来了
‎一切都彼此相连！

translation.en: Now we just have to connect our Frizzle fragments.
translation.zh:
‎现在 我们只需要把福瑞斯的分身
‎拼接起来

translation.en: On to Albuquerque!
-Are we there yet? -[Ms. Frizzle] Arnold.
-[screams] -We use the buddy system here.
translation.zh: ‎阿诺德 ‎我们要结对出行 你的同伴呢？

translation.en: Where's your buddy?
translation.zh: ‎我们要结对出行 你的同伴呢？

translation.en: There's only one other kid on the whole balloon!
translation.zh: ‎这个气球上除了我只有一个孩子！

translation.en: Sorry, Liz. One kid and one lizard.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 蜥蜥 ‎一个孩子和一只蜥蜴

translation.en: -What? Why? -[Ms. Frizzle] Safety first, Arnold!
translation.zh: ‎什么？为什么？ ‎安全第一 阿诺德！

translation.en: You'll all be buddies. Please take a seat.
I'll be over there grading papers.
What papers?
The two essays she made me write on prevailing winds.
translation.zh: ‎她让我写了两篇关于盛行风的论文

translation.en: They're for extra credit!
Anyway, I'm sure Ms. Frizzle knows what she's doing.
translation.zh: ‎我相信福瑞斯老师知道她在干什么

translation.en: Are you? This Ms. Frizzle is afraid to take chances, make mistakes.
translation.zh:
‎是吗？ ‎这个福瑞斯老师不敢冒险
‎不敢犯错误

translation.en: And something tells me she doesn't like getting messy.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得她还有洁癖 不敢放手实践

translation.en: We might need to save her from herself.
translation.zh: ‎我们可能需要从她自己的手里拯救她

translation.en: -But how? -Let's see where we are.
translation.zh: ‎怎么拯救？ ‎我们看看我们在哪儿

translation.en: -[beeps] -Oh, no!
This says we're near Ontario, Canada!
translation.zh: ‎这里显示 我们接近加拿大安大略！

translation.en: That's way off course from Albuquerque!
translation.zh:
‎要去阿尔伯克基的话
‎我们严重偏离航线了

translation.en: No! How did that happen?
[Arnold] Um, New Mexico is this way!
We have to find a different air current and change course, fast!
translation.zh:
‎我们得另找一股气流 改变航向！ ‎-快！
‎-阿诺德！你干什么？

translation.en: Arnold! What are you doing?
I'm taking chances and getting messy-y-y!
translation.zh: ‎我在冒险 我在放手实践！

translation.en: Wha... Huh?
And that's why we wear life jackets.
translation.zh: ‎这就是为什么我们要穿救生衣

translation.en: I heard all the commotion and lowered the balloon.
translation.zh:
‎我听到大喊大叫
‎所以把气球降下来了

translation.en: Salutem primum, remember?
Uh... thanks?
Are we going to go back up in the sky?
Oh, absolutely not, Dorothy Ann.
From here on out, we're sticking much closer to the ground.
translation.zh: ‎从现在起 我们要贴近地面

translation.en: But don't we have to go up to make it to Albuquerque before you fade away?
translation.zh: ‎但是 我们难道不要赶在你消失之前 ‎飞去阿尔伯克基吗？

translation.en: Probably. But I am not going to risk losing a student again.
translation.zh:
‎也许吧
‎但是我不能再次失去一个学生

translation.en: So unprofessional!
Ms. Frizzle? Why are we in Ontario?
translation.zh:
‎福瑞斯老师 我们为什么在安大略？
‎严重偏离航线了

translation.en: -We're way off course. -Excellent question, Arnold.
translation.zh:
‎福瑞斯老师 我们为什么在安大略？
‎严重偏离航线了 ‎问得好 阿诺德

translation.en: You see, the map is flat, but the Earth is not.
translation.zh: ‎你们看 地图是平的 但地球不是

translation.en: The air doesn't move in a straight line.
Since the Earth is round and always rotating...
translation.zh: ‎因为地球是圆的 而且不停地转动…

translation.en: [Arnold] Air currents curve!
[Ms. Frizzle] Correct! It's called the Coriolis effect.
translation.zh: ‎正确 这叫科里奥利效应

translation.en: The Coriolis effect?
Yes! It was in the homework.
-Ahem? -I mean "balloon work."
If the Earth stood still, air could flow straight north and south.
translation.zh:
‎如果地球静止不动
‎空气就会沿直线南北流动

translation.en: But since the Earth turns, it makes the air currents curve.
translation.zh:
‎但因为地球在转动
‎所以气流就沿弧线运动

translation.en: Coriolis!
Air currents in the northern hemisphere are always pulled to the right
and in the southern hemisphere, they're pulled to the left.
So, since we're in the northern hemisphere,
we're getting pulled to the right.
We started in Nova Scotia, trying to go straight to Albuquerque.
translation.zh:
‎我们从新斯科舍出发
‎想径直飞到阿尔伯克基

translation.en: But because air currents curve,
we got pulled to the right towards Ontario.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们向右偏 飞向了安大略

translation.en: Very good, Arnold. That was a rewarding teachable moment, don't you think?
translation.zh:
‎很好 阿诺德 我们收获了知识
‎是不是？

translation.en: But we don't need teachable moments.
We need to find a current that's going the right way!
translation.zh: ‎我们需要找到一股方向正确的气流！

translation.en: The safe way is the right way, Arnold.
translation.zh: ‎安全的路线就是正确的路线 阿诺德

translation.en: Is it?
Incredible. Fiona Frizzle is literally flipping out.
translation.zh: ‎不可思议 ‎菲奥娜福瑞斯真的疯了

translation.en: I'm tired of being cooped up in this balloon!
translation.zh: ‎一直困在气球上 我受够了！

translation.en: I want to do something extreme!
-Ms. Frizzle! -No!
I want to ride a killer whale! I want to take a selfie with Big Foot!
translation.zh: ‎我想骑杀人鲸！ ‎我想和大脚怪合影！

translation.en: I want to climb Kilimanjaro on my hands!
translation.zh: ‎我想倒立爬上乞力马扎罗山！

translation.en: How far are we from Albuquerque?
translation.zh: ‎我们离阿尔伯克基还有多远？

translation.en: We've been going straight north for a while, so I bet we're...
translation.zh:
‎我们向正北方飞行了一段时间了
‎所以我打赌我们…

translation.en: -[beeps] -This can't be right! This says we're in...
Alabama?!
[Wanda] What? How did we go this far east?
translation.zh: ‎什么？我们怎么往东偏了这么多？

translation.en: I thought we were going north.
-Perplexing! -[phone rings]
-[beeps] -Keesha! Arnold!
-How are you guys doing? -We're almost to Arizona!
translation.zh:
‎凯莎！阿诺德！你们怎么样？ ‎-我们快到亚利桑那州了！
‎-不 不是

translation.en: -[Carlos] No, we aren't. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-我们快到亚利桑那州了！
‎-不 不是 ‎什么？

translation.en: Sad but true. We're drifting up the coast of California.
translation.zh:
‎很遗憾 但是真的
‎我们沿着加州海岸线向漂移

translation.en: And we're nowhere near because I fell out of the basket
translation.zh:
‎我们也还差很远呢
‎因为我从气球吊篮里跌落

translation.en: and Ms. Frizzle will only fly a few feet off the ground!
translation.zh:
‎现在 福瑞斯老师
‎只同意离地几米高！

translation.en: We have problems here, too.
We started out heading straight north,
translation.zh: ‎我们一开始向着正北方向飞

translation.en: but somehow we're hundreds of miles off track.
That's because air currents curve. It's the Coriolis effect.
translation.zh:
‎这是因为气流路线是弯曲的 ‎这叫科里奥利效应
‎对不对 福瑞斯老师？

translation.en: Right, Ms. Frizzle?
translation.zh:
‎这叫科里奥利效应
‎对不对 福瑞斯老师？

translation.en: -Good point, Arnold. -Ms. Frizzle!
translation.zh:
‎-说得好 阿诺德
‎-福瑞斯老师！

translation.en: Hey, by the way, what's a gust of wind's favorite color?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 对了 风最喜欢什么颜色？

translation.en: -Blue! [laughs] -Whoa! Frizz, come back!
I'll be here all night! No, I won't.
translation.zh: ‎我整晚都在 不 我要走了

translation.en: This is not funny!
[Ms. Frizzle] Yes, it is!
Was that it? Are they gone forever?
Guys, our Frizzle just disappeared!
translation.zh: ‎同学们… 我们的福瑞斯老师消失了！

translation.en: -[static crackles] -[Keesha] No! Not now! The call dropped!
Guys?
We're on our own.
No FrizzPad and no Frizz?
translation.zh: ‎没有福瑞斯平板 也没有福瑞兹！

translation.en: According to my calculations, it's time to panic!
translation.zh: ‎根据我的计算 现在到了抓狂时间！

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle, you're back!
-You faded all the way out! -For a full three minutes!
translation.zh: ‎你刚才彻底消失了！ ‎整整三分钟！

translation.en: We have to go faster!
We've got to get back up in the sky before we run out of time!
translation.zh: ‎我们得重新升空 不然就来不及了！

translation.en: And I'll try to figure out when that will be.
translation.zh:
‎我会尽量推算一下
‎什么时候是真的来不及

translation.en: I'm sorry, class, but staying low is the only safe course.
translation.zh:
‎对不起 同学们
‎但贴近地面是唯一安全的路线

translation.en: Salutem primum--
No! The time for being safe is over!
translation.zh:
‎-安全第一
‎-不！ ‎现在不能只追求安全了！

translation.en: If we're going to save you, we have to take chances,
translation.zh: ‎要想救你 我们就得冒险

translation.en: make some big mistakes and get really messy!
translation.zh: ‎犯些大错误 真正放手去实践！

translation.en: Whoa! Arnold!
I'm sorry, Ms. Frizzle, but I'm taking over!
translation.zh:
‎对不起 福瑞斯老师
‎但现在我来做主！

translation.en: Arnold, this is another teachable moment.
translation.zh: ‎阿诺德 这也是个学习知识的好时机

translation.en: And the lesson is that it wouldn't be safe to challenge a Ballooning Buccaneer.
translation.zh:
‎这里我们可以学到的就是
‎不要挑战一个搞叛乱的海盗

translation.en: -I surrender. -[sighs] Thank you.
DA, do whatever you can to get everybody back on the FrizzPad.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢 陶乐西 ‎想办法用福瑞斯平板
‎联系到所有人

translation.en: Right! Already on it!
It's time for a full-scale Frizz Mutiny!
translation.zh: ‎现在 我们要对福瑞斯老师造反！

translation.en: [Arnold] It's up to us...
...to save the day!
-Come on, hand over the whoopee cushion. -[Ms. Frizzle splutters]
Awww, but I need it to teach you a lesson about air pressure!
translation.zh: ‎但我需要用它为你们讲解气压的原理

translation.en: Air currents!
Sorry. We can't have you distracting us right now.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 现在不能让你打扰我们

translation.en: There's too much at stake.
At least let me keep my parachute. Please!
So you can use it to teach us more about how air currents work, right?
translation.zh:
‎这样你就可以教给我们
‎更多关于气流的知识 对吗？

translation.en: Well, I was going to say because it's awesome, but...
translation.zh: ‎我是想说 因为降落伞很酷 但是…

translation.en: Unacceptable! You can tell Arnold we're good.
translation.zh: ‎不能接受！ ‎告诉阿诺德我们准备好了

translation.en: -[phone beeps] -We've got all of Fiona's daredevil gear. We're distraction-free!
translation.zh:
‎我们没收了菲奥娜的全部冒险装备
‎我们没有干扰了

translation.en: That's great! We sent you info about the Coriolis effect.
translation.zh:
‎好！我们把关于科里奥利效应的信息
‎发给你们了

translation.en: You should be able to figure out a better path to Albuquerque now!
translation.zh:
‎你们应该能规划出
‎去阿尔伯克基的更好路线

translation.en: We got it, Arnold.
But it's not like we can just make the balloons go straight to Albuquerque.
translation.zh:
‎但我们并不能让气球
‎笔直飞到阿尔伯克基啊

translation.en: We can still only go where the air currents are going.
Our Frizzles are fading!
translation.zh: ‎我们的福瑞斯老师正在消失！

translation.en: We have to get them together before they're gone for good!
translation.zh:
‎我们得让她们复合
‎不然她们就彻底消失了！

translation.en: [Keesha] How do we get there fast enough?
Wait a minute!
We keep treating these baskets like they're just hot-air balloon baskets.
translation.zh:
‎我们一直把这些座舱
‎当成热气球的吊篮

translation.en: -But they aren't! -Yes!
translation.zh: ‎但它们不是！ ‎对啊！它们都是神奇校车的一部分！

translation.en: They're each part of the Magic School Bus!
translation.zh: ‎对啊！它们都是神奇校车的一部分！

translation.en: And we might have just enough magic left for one last ride!
translation.zh:
‎也许我们还有一些神奇魔法
‎足够完成最后一次飞行！

translation.en: If air moves from high pressure to low pressure,
translation.zh: ‎既然空气从高压区流向低压区

translation.en: is there some kind of Bus magic that could create high pressure behind us
translation.zh:
‎我们的神奇校车能否
‎在我们的身后制造出高压

translation.en: to push us forward?
Amazing!
[Ms. Frizzle] Yes! Whoo-hoo!
How did you guys do that?
Liz found a lever under the seat.
translation.zh: ‎蜥蜥在座位下面找到一根拉杆

translation.en: Found it!
I can see it! I can see it!
The machine's squeezing the air together into high pressure behind us...
translation.zh:
‎这台机器挤压我们后方的空气
‎形成高压

translation.en: [Carlos] And it's spreading the air out into low pressure in front of us.
translation.zh: ‎并让我们前方的空气膨胀 形成低压

translation.en: [Ralphie] So the air's rushing from the high pressure to the low pressure!
translation.zh: ‎这样 空气就从高压区流向低压区！

translation.en: Yee-ha!
We're making our own air currents! And at this speed...
translation.zh:
‎我们制造出了我们自己的气流！
‎而且这么快

translation.en: ...we might just make it to Albuquerque in time!
translation.zh: ‎也许我们能及时赶到阿尔伯克基！

translation.en: -[static crackles] -[Arnold] Here's the plan.
We get to Albuquerque, and when we can see each other,
translation.zh:
‎我们赶到阿尔伯克基
‎当我们能看到对方时

translation.en: we get our balloons as close together as possible.
translation.zh: ‎我们就让我们的气球尽量彼此靠近

translation.en: And when we're close enough, we line up the Frizzle fragments.
translation.zh:
‎足够接近的时候
‎我们就把福瑞斯的分身摆好

translation.en: -[static crackles] -[Ralphie] Arnold?
The Frizz is almost completely gone!
You've reached the voicemail of the Frizz. I'm not here to take your call.
translation.zh:
‎你听到的是福瑞兹的语音留言
‎我不能接你的电话

translation.en: -[kids] No! -Just kidding!
Or am I? Am I... am I... am I?
Is she g-g-gone?
Not yet.
There's still some hula left.
-We'll be in Albuquerque soon! -Great news!
translation.zh: ‎我们很快就到阿尔伯克基！ ‎好消息！

translation.en: I was starting to get the tiniest bit worried.
Up high!
What happened to our Frizzle fragment? -Is she OK? -[Ms. Frizzle snaps fingers]
translation.zh:
‎我们的福瑞斯分身怎么了？
‎她没事吧？

translation.en: I think we're good.
Uh... down low?
We're too late!
Ms. Frizzle is fading away!
Now, now. Keep your head. And I'll keep mine, too.
translation.zh:
‎保持你们的头脑
‎我也保住我的头脑

translation.en: Good catch, Dorothy Ann!
Are... are you OK?
I'm perfectly fine, Arnold.
But I don't think the rest of me is coming back this time.
translation.zh:
‎但我看我身体的其他部位
‎这次不会回来了

translation.en: Arnold, hold Ms. Frizzle for a second.
translation.zh: ‎阿诺德 暂时抱着福瑞斯老师

translation.en: So, I've been keeping track.
Ms. Frizzle's body parts faded and then came back.
translation.zh:
‎福瑞斯老师的部分身体消失后
‎又回来了

translation.en: Then her body faded...
And then came back.
And now her body parts have faded again.
translation.zh: ‎现在 她的部分身体又消失了…

translation.en: And they don't seem to be coming back.
I see a pattern, and if it holds,
translation.zh: ‎我看到一个规律 如果确实如此

translation.en: we only have 15 minutes to get them back together
translation.zh:
‎我们只有15分钟的时间
‎把她的身体找回来了

translation.en: or Ms. Frizzle is gone for good!
translation.zh: ‎不然 福瑞斯老师就永远消失了！

translation.en: The FrizzPad is fully back online!
translation.zh: ‎福瑞斯平板完全恢复功能了！

translation.en: Then let's patch everyone in!
It's good to hear from everyone, but I have unsettling news.
translation.zh:
‎听到大家的声音真好
‎但我有令人不安的消息

translation.en: Besides the fact that we have less than 15 minutes
to get our Frizzle fragments back together?
Yes. That storm is still following us!
translation.zh: ‎是的 风暴仍然跟着我们

translation.en: The air current we created is bringing the storm, too.
translation.zh: ‎我们制造的气流把风暴也引过来了

translation.en: What'll happen if it catches up with us?
translation.zh: ‎如果它追上我们 会怎么样？

translation.en: Just do what you can to stay ahead of it. Time is running out!
translation.zh: ‎想方设法跑在风暴前面 ‎时间不多了！

translation.en: We're getting near New Mexico, but we have to go faster!
translation.zh:
‎我们接近新墨西哥了
‎但我们必须加速！

translation.en: I see the storm that got us into all this trouble in the first place!
translation.zh: ‎我看见害我们分开的那个风暴了！

translation.en: We'll have to go around it!
But if you put it behind you, what's to say you won't drag it along with you?
translation.zh:
‎但如果你们把风暴置于你们后方
‎谁知道你们不会拖着它走呢？

translation.en: Uh, guys? What happens if the storms crash together?
translation.zh:
‎同学们 如果两个风暴相撞
‎会怎么样？

translation.en: I don't see any other choice!
There isn't any time left, and if we want to save Ms. Frizzle,
translation.zh: ‎没时间了 要救福瑞斯老师

translation.en: we've got to get past this storm.
We all have to amp up our currents!
I... I don't think we're going to make it in time!
Arnold!
-[thunder] -I can see you guys! We're almost together!
translation.zh: ‎我看见你们了！我们马上就汇合了！

translation.en: Grab your Frizzle fragments so we can line them up!
translation.zh:
‎带上你们的福瑞斯分身
‎我们把她们组合起来！

translation.en: -We're really going to do it! -[Tim] Uh... Jyoti...?
Those storm clouds are getting awfully close!
[Keesha] Just keep ahead of them!
[Arnold] Looks like we're gonna miss each other!
We have to move our pressure systems to turn and swing back around!
translation.zh:
‎我们得调整我们的气压系统
‎掉头回来！

translation.en: Now!
Whoa... Wh-What's going on?
According to my research, atmospheric rivers are common,
translation.zh: ‎根据我的调查 大气河流很普遍

translation.en: with as many as six or more present globally at any given time!
translation.zh: ‎全球经常同时存在六个或者更多！

translation.en: But people don't usually make their own!
translation.zh: ‎但人们一般不会自己制造大气河流！

translation.en: We brought a whole bunch of high and low-pressure systems together.
translation.zh:
‎貌似我们把好几个高压系统和
‎低压系统凑到一起来了

translation.en: When they start swirling around each other, it will make...
translation.zh: ‎当它们相互环绕的时候 就会形成…

translation.en: A hurricane!
[DA] Hurricanes happen at sea!
And this is over land, so technically it's...
translation.zh: ‎我们在陆地上 所以严格来说 这是…

translation.en: a tornado!
-Very good, DA. -[tornado rumbles]
[Arnold] Hang on, everyone!
Help!
Only 30 seconds left. This is it!
Don't give up!
Hold on to your Frizzle fragments! We can do this!
translation.zh: ‎抓紧你们的福瑞斯分身！ ‎我们能行！

translation.en: Come on, come on!
-[sparks sizzle] -Arnold! Look! Look!
[Arnold] Ms. Frizzle!
[Tim] It's working!
Whoa!
[Ms. Frizzle] Wa-hoooo!
[Keesha] You did it, Arnold!
We did it!
Just in time for us to go down in a tornado!
translation.zh: ‎现在在龙卷风中降落还来得及！

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] Would you look at that pressure system?
[kids] Ms. Frizzle!
Yup, it's me! Reunited at last.
And it feels...
Turbulent!
I was going to say magical, but sure. Here we go!
translation.zh: ‎我想说很神奇 但是当然 出发吧！

translation.en: OK, class. We need to counter what caused this storm. Thoughts?
translation.zh:
‎同学们 我们要抵消形成风暴的因素
‎有什么想法？

translation.en: Could we switch the high and low-pressure areas?
translation.zh: ‎我们能不能把高低压区域颠倒过来？

translation.en: Interesting.
[Jyoti] Right now the air from the high-pressure areas
keeps trying to move to the low-pressure areas.
It's pushing the air around and around in a circle.
I get it! But if we reverse the areas of the high and low pressure,
translation.zh: ‎我明白！但如果我们能让高低压反转

translation.en: then the air would start moving the opposite way.
translation.zh: ‎也许空气就会朝相反方向流动

translation.en: And slow the tornado down.
Or maybe even stop it!
No one's ever tried this before, but I'm pretty sure no one's ever had to!
translation.zh:
‎没人尝试过
‎我相信以前没人需要这么做！

translation.en: Well then, let's take a chance!
Seat belts, everyone!
We can do it, Ms. Frizzle! I know we can!
translation.zh:
‎我们能行 福瑞斯老师！
‎我知道我们行！

translation.en: We wouldn't be doing anything if you hadn't gotten me back together, Arnold.
translation.zh:
‎如果你们没让我复原
‎那么一切都是空谈

translation.en: I'm super ready to stop spinning now! [groans]
Almost there. Hold tight!
And one last little trick.
Just a little low pressure in the distance
to send the storm away from the Balloon Fiesta.
-[Bus honks] -Ms. Frizzle, welcome back!
And in one piece, not three!
translation.zh: ‎而且是一个完整的 而不是三个

translation.en: Ahhh, it's good to be back!
I owe some of you a big thanks for laughing at my jokes,
translation.zh: ‎我要感谢你们有些人听我的笑话发笑

translation.en: some others for saving me from a waterfall,
and I think I owe a couple of you grades on balloon work!
translation.zh: ‎而你们两个的气球作业我还没有判呢

translation.en: -It's still your birthday trip, Arnold. -What do you want to do now?
translation.zh:
‎这仍是你的生日旅行 阿诺德 ‎-现在 你想做什么？
‎-希望是在地面

translation.en: -Something on the ground, I hope. -[kids laugh]
translation.zh:
‎-现在 你想做什么？
‎-希望是在地面

translation.en: Yeah, Arnold. I bet you're ready to head home and stay there!
translation.zh: ‎是啊 阿诺德 我猜你一定想回家呆着

translation.en: Actually... let's go where the wind takes us.
translation.zh: ‎事实上 我们不如随风飞翔

translation.en: Good call, Arnold!
-Yeah. The Balloon Fiesta is awesome! -Stunning!
translation.zh: ‎是啊 热气球嘉年华太棒了！ ‎精彩！

translation.en: [Keesha] Look at all those balloons riding the air currents.
translation.zh: ‎看那些乘着气流飞行的气球

translation.en: From high pressure to low stress.
[sighs] Oh, this is truly gorgeous.
I should really take a group picture.
Hey, everybody get together!
-Now smile! -[camera clicks]
That's the problem with these pineapple phones.
translation.zh: ‎这些菠萝手机就是有这种问题

translation.en: The reception's fine, but the camera is awful.
translation.zh: ‎信号不错 但照相功能太差了

translation.en: Whoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hooooo!
I've never felt so...
alive! Whoo-hoo!
-[beeps] -Fiona Frizzle here, currently available to answer questions!
translation.zh:
‎我是菲奥娜福瑞斯
‎现在可以接听电话

translation.en: [kid] Hey, Ms. Frizzle! Hot-air balloons are amazing!
translation.zh: ‎嘿 福瑞斯老师！热气球太有趣了！

translation.en: Can I take one back and forth to school every day?
translation.zh: ‎我能每天坐热气球上学回家吗？

translation.en: I love the way you think, kid.
But remember, there's no way to steer a balloon
translation.zh:
‎但别忘了 你不能操纵气球的方向
‎只能调整

translation.en: other than by adjusting the altitude to catch different air currents.
translation.zh:
‎但别忘了 你不能操纵气球的方向
‎只能调整 ‎高度 进入不同的大气环流

translation.en: There aren't any brakes on a hot-air balloon either.
[chuckles] That's my kind of aircraft!
You'll need to know the wind speed
and direction both on the ground and where it was...
[laughs] Gotcha!
[chuckles] This is funny!
-[balloons inflate] -Hello.
Some balloon pilots even release a helium balloon
translation.zh:
‎有些气球飞行员还会释放氦气球
‎看看它飞上去以后

translation.en: to see what happens to it as it goes up, but I like my version better!
translation.zh:
‎有些气球飞行员还会释放氦气球
‎看看它飞上去以后 ‎会怎么样 但我更喜欢我的做法！

translation.en: Hey, how's the weather up there?
I'll tell you when I get down!
-[laughs] Nice catch! -Thank you.
[kid] There's no way they could have made it from Hawaii, Peru, and Nova Scotia
translation.zh:
‎他们在同一天从夏威夷
‎秘鲁和新斯科舍

translation.en: to Albuquerque in the same day!
translation.zh: ‎飞到阿尔伯克基 这不可能

translation.en: That's true. We used a little Bus magic to get everyone together in time.
translation.zh:
‎是的 我们用了一点校车魔法
‎让大家及时汇合

translation.en: Without Bus magic, a balloon's speed is as changeable as the wind.
translation.zh:
‎没有校车的魔法 气球的速度
‎就像风一样变化不定

translation.en: But these babies can move fast!
You can take one all the way around the world in just over 11 days!
translation.zh: ‎坐热气球可以用11天环游地球！

translation.en: Ehhh! Over there!
-Got your phone! -Nice one!
[kid] One last question.
How exactly did the class create a tornado when they were reuniting?
translation.zh: ‎同学们彼此相聚时 到底是怎么 ‎制造出龙卷风的？

translation.en: And what is a tornado anyway? Just a big storm?
translation.zh:
‎而且 龙卷风到底是什么？
‎就是个大风暴吗？

translation.en: Remember, each of the three...
Each of the three balloons had high pressure behind it
translation.zh: ‎这三个气球 每个后面都有个高气压

translation.en: and low pressure areas leading the way.
[The Frizz] Yeah!
And when all of those high and low pressure areas got together,
translation.zh: ‎当所有那些高气压和低气压碰到一起

translation.en: it made the perfect conditions for a whirling, swirling,
translation.zh:
‎就出现了形成低压旋转风暴的
‎理想条件

translation.en: low-pressure storm called a cyclone, baby!
It just depends on where the storm takes place.
Storms on the ocean are hurricanes or monsoons;
translation.zh: ‎海洋上空的风暴叫飓风或季风

translation.en: storms over land are tornadoes.
[kid] Whatever it was, it was very cool! Thanks, Ms. Frizzle.
translation.zh:
‎不管是什么 真是很酷啊！
‎谢谢 福瑞斯老师

translation.en: [all three] You're welcome!
Goodbye, now!
Whoo-hoo-hoo-hoooo!
-[horn honks] -[Ms. Frizzle] Seat belts, everyone!
[Arnold] Please let this be a normal field trip!
translation.zh: ‎希望这是一场普通的野外实习

translation.en: -[Wanda] With the Frizz? -[kids] No way!
♪ Oh, cruising on down Main Street ♪
♪ You're relaxed and feeling good ♪
♪ Next thing that you know ♪
-♪ You're seeing... ♪ -[Ms. Frizzle] Whoo-hooo!
translation.zh:
‎突然之间 你看到 ‎-喔嗬！
‎-什么？

translation.en: ♪ Octopus in the neighborhood! ♪
♪ Surfing on a soundwave ♪
-♪ Or swinging through the stars ♪ -Yee-ha!
♪ Take a left at your intestine ♪
♪ Take your second right past Mars ♪
translation.zh: ‎在第二个路口右转 绕过火星

translation.en: ♪ On the Magic School Bus ♪
-♪ Navigate a nostril ♪ -[Ralphie sneezes]
♪ Climb on the Magic School Bus ♪
-♪ Spank a plankton, too ♪ -[Wanda] Take that!
♪ On our Magic School Bus ♪
♪ Raft a river of lava ♪
♪ On the Magic School Bus ♪
♪ Such a fine thing to do ♪
♪ So strap your bones right to the seat ♪
♪ Come on in and don't be shy ♪
♪ Just to make your day complete ♪
